dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is a prominent corpus extensively utilized in speech recognition research, featuring 960 hours of English speech sourced from audiobooks available through the LibriVox project. It includes two main evaluation sets: Test-Clean, consisting of high-quality recordings, and Test-Others, which presents various challenges such as accents and background noise.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:description: Public Video is an in-house dataset derived from 29.8K hours of audio extracted from English public videos. It has been ethically curated and processed to ensure privacy, featuring two evaluation sets: Dictation, consisting of unscripted conversations, and Messaging, which includes shorter audio messages.
dcterms:title: Public Video
